text:
Question 27) There is a road to walk the men do not cry.
Woman behind the wheel, constant danger.
The articulation between the verbal and non -verbal elements of the text is to trigger the
A) Identification of distinctions between women and men.
B) Review of stereotyped gender representations.
C) adoption of preventive measures to combat sexism.
D) ratification of female and male behaviors.
E) resumption of opinions about the diversity of social roles.
